p: The animals were randomly assigned into different groups of six animals per group to perform hypoglycemic, oral glucose tolerance test, and antihyperglycemic activity test. Dose selection was based on, acute toxicity study and a previous study of the plant extract, 23 as well as pilot experiments. The middle dose was one-tenth of the limit dose, the higher dose was twice the middle dose, and the lower dose was calculated as half of the middle dose. 29 The study was conducted using the oral route of administration since the plant materials are traditionally used by people via the oral route. 17, 22
